name: Stay Connected and Stay Focused
description:
Description:

A 3D horror game about two partners working together to do certain tasks and protecting each other from Benjamin, a monster who roams their locations to kill them. You have to work together with your partner to survive until 6AM.

Warning: Before playing, I made a typo in the game where you had to shut down the power to keep the monster away, I meant to say, "Turn on the power if the power goes out or you will die." Thanks for reading this warning!

This game is a demo, the full game will come out in a few weeks! Give this game a notice.
